BodyName: Committee on Governmental Operations, State & Federal Legislation
Comment: Jointly with the Committee on Civil Service and Labor.

Items.Title: Oversight - State of the City Workforce.
Items.MatterName: Oversight - State of the City Workforce.

Items.Title: Jointly with the Committee on Civil Service and Labor

A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the department of citywide administrative services to maintain an interactive webpage providing information on the city government workforce and to publish semiannual reports aggregating and summarizing such information
Items.MatterName: Requiring the department of citywide administrative services to maintain an interactive webpage providing information on the city government workforce and to publish semiannual reports aggregating and summarizing such information.
